geoQuery.query: WITH l AS (SELECT sp.line_id ID ,waterway_cross_id P_ID ,CASE WHEN sp.z_coord IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE sp.z_coord END Y ,(sp.measure+sp.measure_offset) / 1000 + s.station_begin - {START_KM} X ,' '::TEXT "LABEL" ,row_number() over (PARTITION BY waterway_cross_id ORDER BY (sp.measure+sp.measure_offset) / 1000 + s.station_begin) rwn from pods.series s JOIN web50.waterway_cross_station_point sp ON s.route_id = sp.route_id_offset and sp.waterway_cross_id in (select cc.waterway_cross_id from web50.waterway_cross cc where cc.zone_id={ZONE_ID}) join pods.line l on l.line_id=sp.line_id WHERE sp.route_id = {ROUTE_ID} AND to_char(sp.begin_date,'YYYY')=substring('{BEGIN_DATE}',1,4) AND sp.z_coord IS NOT null), min_x as (select min(rwn) rwn,P_ID from l group by P_ID), max_x as (select max(rwn) rwn,P_ID from l group by P_ID), min_measure as (select min(x) measure from l) select ID, P_ID ,X ,Y, "LABEL",rwn, style from ( select l.ID, l.P_ID, l.X -m.measure X,0 Y, l."LABEL",l.rwn-1 rwn,'PROFILE' style from l l,min_x mx, min_measure m where l.P_ID=mx.P_ID and l.rwn=mx.rwn union all select l.ID, l.P_ID, l.X -m.measure X,l.Y, l."LABEL",l.rwn,'PROFILE' style from l, min_measure m union all select l.ID, l.P_ID, l.X -m.measure X,0 Y, l."LABEL",l.rwn+1,'PROFILE' style from l l,max_x mx, min_measure m where l.P_ID=mx.P_ID and l.rwn=mx.rwn union all select l.ID, l.P_ID, l.X -m.measure X,0 Y, l."LABEL",(select mx.rwn+2 from max_x mx where mx.P_ID=l.P_ID) rwn,'PROFILE' style from l l,min_x mx, min_measure m where l.P_ID=mx.P_ID and l.rwn=mx.rwn union all select P_ID ID, P_ID*(-1) P_ID ,X -m.measure X,Y, "LABEL",rwn,'PIPE' style from l, min_measure m) dd order by ID,rwn
